original_text: And the sockets of the court round about, and the sockets of the court gate, and all the pins of the tabernacle, and all the pins of the court round about.
korean_text: 뜰 주위의 기둥 받침과 그 휘장 문의 기둥 받침이며 성막의 모든 말뚝과 뜰 주위의 모든 말뚝을 만들었더라

sentences.original_text: And the sockets of the court round about
and the sockets of the court gate
and all the pins of the tabernacle
and all the pins of the court round about
